translation.greeting: Hello, noble visitor! My name is
translation.name: Sabrina Drashen.
translation.aboutMeText: I am from Pará State and I have lived in Florianópolis for over 3 years now. I first graduated as a Bachelor of Tourism. I worked as an interpreter, guide, monitor, and I got to know several people and places. But... that "click" was missing, you know? As I have always been into technology, I decided to jump in this area as soon as I had the opportunity. Right decision! I like to creating, innovating, facing challenges, I have great hability to work in group and I believe that in this new professional field I can go far away. I am currently looking for job opportunities and to learn more and grow in the technology.
translation.warnProjects: Work in progress. Soon, you will be able to check out my complete portfolio.
